sentences.english: I counted every day the date when jack would return.
sentences.chinese: 我每天反反复复的数着安杰的归期。

sentences.english: The teacher drubbed those silly notions out of the student's head.
sentences.chinese: 老师反反复复地讲得学生打消了愚蠢想法。

sentences.english: I repeatedly caught several times, or a fish nor.
sentences.chinese: 我反反复复钓了好几次，还是一条鱼也没有。

sentences.english: Lather, rinse and repeat for several years.
sentences.chinese: 这样反反复复，又过了几年。

sentences.english: You might have to read something a few times before you understand it.
sentences.chinese: 阅读时可能得反反复复才能看懂它。

sentences.english: All parties seemed tolerant of the back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 而各方对这种反反复复的沟通似乎都并不介意。

sentences.english: Like a tail perfection, repeated many times.
sentences.chinese: 就像是断尾求全，反反复复多少次。

sentences.english: I pay the sentiment has gravely, the repeated love cannot support.
sentences.chinese: 我付出的情有多深重，反反复复的爱不能相拥。

sentences.english: Due to repetition, these ideas also begin to have no intrinsic value.
sentences.chinese: 反反复复，这些思想观念也开始失去了其内在价值。
